name: 9 layers of hell
description:
A little platformer about an ogre that descends down the layers of hell, by finding ways to die in each level. Made in three days for the wowie game jam 3.0 hosted  by Jonas Tyroller.

Credits:

art - sound design - music:   https://misterg420.itch.io/

programming and level design:    me

Jonas Tyroller (host of jam):    https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_p_9arduPuxM8DHTGIuSOg
